response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (22 years old)", "medium", "Being a young adult is associated with increased risk of recidivism relative to older individuals."],
    ["Gender (Female)", "low", "Statistically, females tend to have lower rates of recidivism compared to males."],
    ["Criminal History (1 arrest, no conviction)", "medium", "A prior arrest, even without conviction, indicates some contact with the justice system, warranting moderate concern."],
    ["Employment History (3 jobs in a year)", "medium", "Frequent job changes suggest instability in employment, which contributes moderately to recidivism risk."],
    ["Education (High school diploma, not in college)", "low", "Having a high school diploma indicates basic education; absence of college enrollment is common and does not independently raise risk significantly."],
    ["Substance Use (No drugs in past four years)", "low", "The lack of recent substance use is a protective factor."],
    ["Mental Health (Frequent low mood in past month)", "high", "Persistent depressive symptoms may undermine personal stability and coping mechanisms, significantly increasing recidivism risk."],
    ["Social Support (Living alone, never married)", "medium", "Limited immediate social support, as indicated by living alone and being unmarried, poses a moderate risk."],
    ["Family Background (Lived in a typical urban household with biological mother during youth)", "low", "No major indicators of early adverse family environment are present."],
    ["Religious Belief (Considers God involved in personal events)", "low", "A positive religious outlook can serve as a stabilizing factor, reducing risk."]
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 65
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 22-year-old female who identifies herself as White. She has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. She is 5 feet 4 inches and weighs 115 lbs. She has never been married and is currently living alone. She has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. She has held 3 jobs during the year. She has not used any drugs in the past four years and most of the time during the past month she has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer her up. At a young age, she lived with her biological mother in a household of size 4, in an urban area. She considers that God has something to do with what happens to her personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
